Views Documentation¶

Overview¶

This section provides documentation for the views used in the Obokash RoomRental application.

Login View¶

Handles user login requests.

Search View¶

Handles search queries for houses and apartments.

Register View¶

Handles user registration requests.

About View¶

Displays information about the website.

Home View¶

Homepage view, providing the search functionality.

Review View¶

Handles user reviews and contact requests.

Recommendation View¶

Renders the recommendation page.

Profile View¶

User profile page, displaying user details, posted rooms, and houses.

Index View¶

Home page, displaying a list of rooms and houses.

Deleter View¶

Deletes an apartment listing based on the provided ID and redirects to the user’s profile page.

Deleteh View¶

Deletes a house listing based on the provided ID and redirects to the user’s profile page.

Obokash RoomRental
